message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which holds immense value for us at an asking price of $500000. We believe this price reflects the quality, innovation, and potential impact of our product. We are confident it will be a valuable asset to your endeavors. Please let us know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange a viewing.

Thank you for offering your product, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on it, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $400000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After considering your offer, I'm glad to provide some flexibility. I am willing to negotiate down to $450000 for the product. This price still reflects its high value, while accommodating your budget constraints. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal.
